abstract: At Public Assembly in Williamsburg on Tuesday, a pair of local labels were facing off in adjacent spaces during the CMJ Music Marathon.
snippet: At Public Assembly in Williamsburg on Tuesday, a pair of local labels were facing off in adjacent spaces during the CMJ Music Marathon.
lead_paragraph: Often at the CMJ Music Marathon you don't have to walk more than 15 feet to have your mind changed about the sounds of the day. At Public Assembly in Williamsburg on Tuesday, all you had to do was go to the next room. All night, and into the morning, a pair of labels were facing off in adjacent spaces.

headline.main: CMJ Offers a New New Sound, Right Next Door
